# .NET Release Metadata
> Structured, machine-readable .NET release data designed for AI assistants and automated tooling.

## Getting Started
- [Release index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/richlander/core/main/release-notes/index.json): HAL JSON entry point for all .NET versions with navigation links
- [Usage guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/richlander/core/main/release-notes/usage.md): Detailed workflows and best practices for AI assistants
- [Terminology](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/richlander/core/main/release-notes/terminology.md): Definitions of fields, abbreviations, and document types

## Key Data Sources
- [Latest release](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/richlander/core/main/release-notes/9.0/index.json): Current .NET 9.0 release information  
- [Latest LTS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/richlander/core/main/release-notes/8.0/index.json): Current Long-Term Support release (.NET 8.0)
- [Security advisories](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/richlander/core/main/release-notes/history/index.json): Historical CVE vulnerability data by year/month
- [Support policy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/richlander/core/main/support.md): .NET support lifecycle and end-of-life dates

## Common Queries
- **Version patches**: `/release-notes/{version}/index.json` (e.g., 8.0/index.json)
- **Specific release**: `/release-notes/{version}/{patch}/release.json` (e.g., 8.0/8.0.17/release.json)
- **CVEs by month**: `/release-notes/history/{year}/{month}/cve.json` (e.g., history/2025/06/cve.json)
- **OS support**: `/release-notes/{version}/supported-os.json`

## Data Format
- **JSON files**: Authoritative structured data (use these primarily)
- **Markdown files**: Human-readable fallback content
- **HAL navigation**: Follow `_links` for resource discovery and traversal
